rows.label: qst104001_msg001
rows.name:
Oh, hello there. What a
lovely Driver you are.

rows.label: qst104001_msg002
rows.name:
I am Lavina Albani, eldest
daughter of the noble Albani
family of Invidia.

rows.label: qst104001_msg003
rows.name:
Oh my! How careless of me to blurt
out my family name like that!

rows.label: qst104001_msg004
rows.name:
Please! I must ask you to keep
my noble status a secret!

rows.label: qst104001_msg005
rows.name: I am here incognito, you see...

rows.label: qst104001_msg006
rows.name:
I've come in search of ingredients
to make a certain medicine.

rows.label: qst104001_msg007
rows.name:
I've heard rumors that this
medicine can cure any illness in
an instant. Have you heard of it?

rows.label: qst104001_msg008
rows.name:
You see, my dear older brother has
been stricken with a mysterious illness
and has been bedridden for days...

rows.label: qst104001_msg009
rows.name:
The doctor says that this
medicine could cure my
brother's illness, but...

rows.label: qst104001_msg010
rows.name:
...to make it, he needs
ingredients that can only
be found in this region.

rows.label: qst104001_msg011
rows.name:
I wanted so desperately to help my
brother that I volunteered to go and
gather the ingredients myself.

rows.label: qst104001_msg012
rows.name:
My father was against it at first, but
I persuaded him, and he agreed to let
me go, so long as I had an escort.

rows.label: qst104001_msg013
rows.name:
And so I came here, which was
all well and good, however...

rows.label: qst104001_msg014
rows.name:
In my haste, I forgot to ask where
I could find the ingredients.

rows.label: qst104001_msg015
rows.name:
B-But I do know what's
needed! If I just search
everywhere, I'm sure to...

rows.label: qst104001_msg016
rows.name: R-Really?! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst104001_msg017
rows.name:
The ingredients for the
medicine are Floating
Creature Skin and Stamin-Nass.

rows.label: qst104001_msg018
rows.name:
I'm sorry to trouble you,
but I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst104001_msg101
rows.name:
The ingredients I need are Floating
Creature Skin and Stamin-Nass.

rows.label: qst104001_msg102
rows.name:
I know it's a bother,
but I'm in your hands.
